column1: Scramble: UR5+ DR3+ DL3+ UL2+ U5- R1+ D5+ L1+ ALL1- y2 U3- R2+ D3+ L4- ALL1+
Memorize up to 14 numbers using aforementioned arithmetics applying modulo 12.
<li>Memo 1: memorize M1 = D - R + ul - l. D - R = -1
• Memo 6: memorize M6 = R - DR + l - u. M6 = 1
• Memo 7: memorize M7 = d - r + UL - L. M7 = -5
• Memo 12: memorize M12 = r - dr + L - U. M12 = -3
<li>Memo 13: memorize M13 = R + L - UL - DR + c - u - d. M13 = -5. Notice c = 2 instead of 8 since 0 is at the bottom instead of the top
column2: this was not relevant for other memos since we used to always compare two clocks on white side.

column1: • Memo 14: memorize M14 = U + D - C - DL - UR - l - r. M14 = 3. Same as above notice l = 8 instead of 2.
Now we should execute 7 simultaneous moves (14 moves in total).

column2: white pin means the pin is sticking out
the execution never requires any operation on the two bottom dials.

column1: We will use left dial to represent the topleft dial
column2: and right dial to represent the topright dial.
then execute M1 with the left dial and M2 with the right dial.
then execute M3 with left dial
then execute M5 with left dial

column1: Step 4: press down topleft pin and pop up bottomright pin
column2: then execute M7 with left dial
then execute M9 with left dial
then execute M11 with left dial
pop up bottom right pin (keep topleft pin up
column3: a backslash is now sticking out)
column4: then execute M12 with left dial
